amendment.description: An amendment numbered 64 printed in Part A of House Report 118-602 to move $10,000,000 from renewable energy programs to enhance the security of existing electrical transformers from cyber threats and from physical attacks from individuals.
amendment.purpose: Amendment reduces the account for the Department of Energy's Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy by $10 million and increases the account for the Department of Energy's Grid Development by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Van Drew amendment (A036) Agreed to by recorded vote: 214 - 203 (Roll no. 379).

action.text: Amendment (A036) offered by Mr. Van Drew.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Van Drew amendment (A036) Agreed to by recorded vote: 214 - 203 (Roll no. 379).
